full_text: OBTS Number PROBABLE CAUSE AFFIDAVIT 1 Arrest 3 Request for Warrant 2 Juvenile Agency ORI Number Agency Name Agency Report Number F L 0 5 0 0 6 0 0 PALM BEACH POLICE DEPARTMENT 7 6 1 1 0 5 1 0 0 1 2 6 3 1 0 2 4 Charge Type 1. Felony 3. Misdemeanor 5. Ordinance Check as many 2. Traffic Felony 4. Traffic Misdemeanor 6. Other Charge Description Charge Description Possession of Marijuana Possession of Drug Paraphernalia Victim's Name (Last, First, Middle) Local Address (Street, Apt. Number) (City) (State) (Zip) Phone Business Address (Name, Street) (City) (State) (Zip) Phone The undersigned certifies and swears that he/she has just and reasonable grounds to believe, and does believe that the above named Defendant committed the following violation of law. The Person taken into custody committed the below acts in my presence. was observed by that he/she saw the arrested person commit the below acts. confessed to admitting to the below facts. was found to have committed the below acts, resulting from my (described) investigation. On the 11 day of SEPTEMBER 2005 at 1144 A.M. P.M. (Specifically include facts constituting cause for arrest.) On Sunday, September 11, 2005, at approximately 2346 Hours, I observed a four door white Mitsubishi, FL Tag #C104TV parked in a safety zone within a curve in the roadway, across from 760 North Ocean Blvd. As I drove up behind the vehicle, the vehicle left the safety zone, which I then conducted a car stop on the 200 block of Bahia Cabana Lane. Upon approaching the auto, I observed five occupants inside the car, several having bloodshot eyes. I also detected an odor of marijuana from inside the auto along with observing the occupants appearing to be nervous. I spoke with the occupants of the vehicle and asked them if they had marijuana. The Defendant, DOR 1/30/86 informed me that she did. Having me a clean plastic bag containing marijuana, a brown paper bag containing marijuana and a glass pipe containing marijuana residue. Both the marijuana and paraphernalia tested positive. Based on the aforementioned incident, I arrested and charged with possession of marijuana, FSS 893.13(6)(B) and possession of drug paraphernalia, FSS 893.147. (Marijuana weighed at 3.0 Grams) SWORN AND SUBSCRIBED BEFORE ME Sat Kirkpatrick NOTARY/PUBLIC/CLERK OF COURT/POLICE OFFICER 9-12-05 DATE Signature of Arresting/Investigating Officer Ace Hernandez Garcia NAME OF OFFICER (PLEASE PRINT) 9/16/05 DATE 1 OF 1 PAGE DISTRIBUTION: WHITE - Court Copy GREEN - State Attorney YELLOW - Agency PINK - Agency 07/26/17 Page 2318 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00032631

Based on the aforementioned incident, I arrested and charged with possession of marijuana, FSS 893.13(6)(B) and possession of drug paraphernalia, FSS 893.147. (Marijuana weighed at 3.0 Grams)

additional_notes: The document is a probable cause affidavit with handwritten statements and signatures. It appears to be a police report detailing an arrest for possession of marijuana and drug paraphernalia.
